name: 东方驾考模拟器|Chinese Driving License Test
name_original: 东方驾考模拟器|Chinese Driving License Test
description:
Want to take a driving test? Or are you ready to take the driving test? Then come and buy a driving test simulator.
All questions are 2018 latest question bank, of course, we will update at any time to ensure that the question bank is complete.
Of course, if you are just a teenager, it does not prevent you from buying a right one, after all, to participate sooner or later.




The game includes:
1, more than 1,000 subjects a test question
2, simulation test function: full simulation, random 100 questions, see if you can pass the exam.
3, sequential learning mode: all the questions in the library order practice, choose the best answer.


The Oriental Driving Test Simulator, the Science One Exam includes the latest and most complete question bank, we will continue to update in the follow-up to ensure the most complete question bank.
If you want any other theme or UI you can come up with, let everyone learn the driving school content more happier.
